message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a fantastic product at a price of $9,500.  I think you'll find this to be a very fair offer considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the product, but I believe I can find a better deal elsewhere. I am willing to pay $8,500 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I'm confident in the value of this product, I'm willing to come down to $9,000.  This is my final offer.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the flexibility. However, I still believe I can find the product elsewhere within my budget. I would like to counter with an offer of $8,750.
